{"blocks":[{"key":"a5g2t","text":"Carefully discard the supernatant, leaving ∼50 µl of buffer above the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c69tv","text":"Resuspended in pre-chilled Blocking Buffer (same volume as before) by gently pipetting up and down 5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dgfe","text":"Re-pellet nuclei at   and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"800","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F1E677A0165D11EFBC440A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aqdfs","text":"Wash nuclei again with Blocking Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9s6ld","text":"Pellet nuclei at   and carefully discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"800","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"12E47ACD165E11EFBC440A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee20p","text":"Resuspend nuclei in 600 µl (or volume of interest depending on the input tissue) pre-chilled Blocking Buffer and proceed to filtering using Flowmi Cell Strainers in clean 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qnth","text":"Transfer the nuclei   to sorting facility on ice and perform the sorting as soon as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"26975CCA165E11EFBC440A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}
